# do not edit SQL template files directly
# example for ecommerce_uk.sql when upgrade from 1.7 to 1.8 before release
createdb -U db_user -h localhost -E UTF8 onxshop_template_temp
psql -U db_user -h localhost onxshop_template_temp < /opt/onxshop/1.7/project_skeleton/ecommerce_uk.sql
psql -U db_user -h localhost onxshop_template_temp < /opt/onxshop/dev/docs/database/upgrade-1.5.x-to-1.6.0.sql
pg_dump -U db_user -h localhost --no-owner onxshop_template_temp > /opt/onxshop/dev/project_skeleton/ecommerce_uk.sql
dropdb -U db_user -h localhost onxshop_template_temp

# do the same for all templates in project_skeleton folder
